TopicTitle: Space Colony (Lathye and other celestial bodys)

Articles.Content:
Space Colony

Objectives:

Primary

-build lathe colony (possibly floating, this is not going to happen it causes to much lag.)

-land on ethos

-land on every land able surface

Secondary

-com sat in orbit around earth lathye arranged to provide maximum coverage

-refuelling depots

-mun colony

-minimus small outpost (rover??)

-other???

Ships Needed

-Com Sats

-Colony Ships

-escorts fighters

-SSTO space planes

-Rovers

-Shuttles

-land craft

-shuttle

-aquatic capable ships

-other???

-Supply line from lathe to kerbin

-lifter

-fighter to destroy debris

??should we weaponize this Challenge??

I'am doing it with 2 other people, i will post the save when we achieve something useful. We are mostly noobs so please be patient. Thank You

We have a station in orbit fully fuelled
